title: Wild Rye’s Fall Products
content:
Wild Rye, makers of Women’s lifestyle and dirt apparel, just announced its Fall Launch with a two new pieces of apparel…

  • Emmett Overalls – NEW 2024 – $159 -These stretchy, breathable eco-canvas overalls are replacing the brand’s top-selling Eleanor overalls and will be featured on all the ladies on this year’s dig crew at Red Bull Rampage. The overalls feature a more boxy, modern fit, the chest pocket snaps closed for added security of keys and chapstick, an interior pocket inside the chest pocket offers extra protected storage, and the durable abrasion-resistant fabric holds up in rowdy terrain.
  • Camas Crew – NEW 2024 – $79 – This is the perfect crewneck to toss over your bike jersey after a long ride or over any outfit, from fall tailgates to Oktoberfests in town. Offering superior comfort, this crewneck is made of an organic cotton / recycled poly blend, embroidered Wild Rye branding on the neckline, and a modern and boxy fit for ultra-cozy vibes.
  • Eleanor Chammy – $115 – For cycling indoors or outdoors, the Eleanor Chammy is made with compressive fabric, the premium Italian chamois pad is ultra-breathable, a super comfortable high yoga-style waistband keeps you comfortable, and a light silicone beading on the legs holds everything in place.

Check out the full lineup at Wild Rye.

The post Wild Rye’s Fall Products appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
